```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tiotemp)
library(AirSensor)
library(shiny)
```

```{r}
setArchiveBaseUrl("http://data.mazamascience.com/PurpleAir/v1") # SCAQMD sensors
sensors <- sensor_load()
labels <- sensors$meta$label
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
inputPanel(
  selectInput("sensor", label = "Select Sensor",
              choices = labels),
  dateRangeInput("dates", label = "Select Date Domain")
)
```

```{r}
updateData <- function() {
  dates <- strftime(input$dates, "%Y%m%d")
  sensor <- sensors %>% 
    sensor_filterMeta(.data$label == input$sensor) %>% 
    sensor_filterDate(startdate = dates[1], enddate = dates[2])
}
```

```{r}
breaks <- c(1,2,3,5,6,8,9,10,20,30,40,50)
colors <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(11, "Spectral")
renderTimeseriesMap({
  timeseriesMap(sensors$data, sensors$meta, inputId = "sensor", breaks = breaks, colors = colors)
})

```
